title: Research Ethics: Systematic Education for Mathematics Researchers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis and understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Education focused on ethical issues in mathematical research (data manipulation, plagiarism, conflicts among co-researchers, etc.). Content design requires smartphone-based LMS integration.

learning_goals: Learners can classify and analyze cases of at least three types of research misconduct (e.g., plagiarism, data fabrication, author misappropriation).
A checklist for ethics review items can be utilized for self-diagnosis when preparing a research proposal.
Conflicts of interest that may arise during research reporting can be identified, and management strategies can be proposed.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
